content.full_text: Envelope of Abraham Lincoln to Josiah B. Herrick, [2 June 1849]1
paragraphs: Envelope of Abraham Lincoln to Josiah B. Herrick, [2 June 1849]1

footnotes.text:
1Abraham Lincoln wrote  “Free” and signed his name.  He also wrote “M C” and the return
                  address.  This envelope most likely enclosed Lincoln’slettertoJosiah B. Herrickpertaining to Lincoln’s efforts to become commissioner of theU.S. General Land Office. See theGeneral Land Office Affair.
